entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 17 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
